StartType.description: How this object behaves when it first spawns. Event On means this object will wait until it's triggered by an event to begin searching for players to bomb.

AttackInterval.description: The time in-between attempts to attack the player.

SearchBoxWidth.description: The width of the invisible box this object uses to search for players to bomb.

SearchBoxHeight.description: The height of the invisible box this object uses to search for players to bomb.

SearchBoxDepth.description: The depth of the invisible box this object uses to search for players to bomb.

RespawnTime.description: How long before this object respawns.

In3D.description: Whether this object is in a 3D section, or a 2D section.

Extra.value: Generic green circular badniks floating via a propeller that can shoot generic bullets.
